verses.verse: But it displeased <S%H3415><s%> <S%H8799><s%> Yonah <S%H3124><s%> exceedingly <S%H1419><s%> <S%H7451><s%>, and he was very angry <S%H2734><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.

And he prayed <S%H6419><s%> <S%H8691><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, I pray <S%H577><s%> thee, O YY <S%H3068><s%>, was not this my saying <S%H1697><s%>, when I was yet in my country <S%H127><s%>? Therefore I fled <S%H1272><s%> <S%H8800><s%> before <S%H6923><s%> <S%H8765><s%> unto Tarshish <S%H8659><s%>: for I knew <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8804><s%> that thou art a gracious <S%H2587><s%> 'Elohim <S%H410><s%>, and merciful <S%H7349><s%>, slow <S%H750><s%> to anger <S%H639><s%>, and of great <S%H7227><s%> kindness <S%H2617><s%>, and repentest <S%H5162><s%> <S%H8737><s%> thee of the evil <S%H7451><s%>.

Therefore now, O YY <S%H3068><s%>, take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, I beseech thee, my life <S%H5315><s%> from me; for it is better <S%H2896><s%> for me to die <S%H4194><s%> than to live <S%H2416><s%>.
Then said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>, Doest thou well <S%H3190><s%> <S%H8687><s%> to be angry <S%H2734><s%> <S%H8804><s%> ?

So Yonah <S%H3124><s%> went out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8799><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%>, and sat <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8799><s%> on the east side <S%H6924><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%>, and there made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> him a booth <S%H5521><s%>, and sat <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8799><s%> under it in the shadow <S%H6738><s%>, till he might see <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8799><s%> what would become of the city <S%H5892><s%>.

And the YY <S%H3068><s%> 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> prepared <S%H4487><s%> <S%H8762><s%> a gourd <S%H7021><s%>, and made it to come up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8799><s%> over Yonah <S%H3124><s%>, that it might be a shadow <S%H6738><s%> over his head <S%H7218><s%>, to deliver <S%H5337><s%> <S%H8687><s%> him from his grief <S%H7451><s%>. So Yonah <S%H3124><s%> was exceeding <S%H1419><s%> <S%H8057><s%> glad <S%H8055><s%> <S%H8799><s%> of the gourd <S%H7021><s%>.

But 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> prepared <S%H4487><s%> <S%H8762><s%> a worm <S%H8438><s%> when the morning <S%H7837><s%> rose <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8800><s%> the next day <S%H4283><s%>, and it smote <S%H5221><s%> <S%H8686><s%> the gourd <S%H7021><s%> that it withered <S%H3001><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.

And it came to pass, when the sun <S%H8121><s%> did arise <S%H2224><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, that 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> prepared <S%H4487><s%> <S%H8762><s%> a vehement <S%H2759><s%> east <S%H6921><s%> wind <S%H7307><s%>; and the sun <S%H8121><s%> beat <S%H5221><s%> <S%H8686><s%> upon the head <S%H7218><s%> of Yonah <S%H3124><s%>, that he fainted <S%H5968><s%> <S%H8691><s%>, and wished <S%H7592><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in himself <S%H5315><s%> to die <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, It is better <S%H2896><s%> for me to die <S%H4194><s%> than to live <S%H2416><s%>.

And 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to Yonah <S%H3124><s%>, Doest thou well <S%H3190><s%> <S%H8687><s%> to be angry <S%H2734><s%> <S%H8804><s%> for the gourd <S%H7021><s%>? And he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, I do well <S%H3190><s%> <S%H8687><s%> to be angry <S%H2734><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, even unto death <S%H4194><s%>.

Then said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>, Thou hast had pity <S%H2347><s%> <S%H8804><s%> on the gourd <S%H7021><s%>, for the which thou hast not laboured <S%H5998><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, neither madest it grow <S%H1431><s%> <S%H8765><s%>; which came up in a night <S%H1121><s%> <S%H3915><s%>, and perished <S%H6><s%> <S%H8804><s%> in a night <S%H1121><s%> <S%H3915><s%>:

And should not I spare <S%H2347><s%> <S%H8799><s%> Ninveh <S%H5210><s%>, that great <S%H1419><s%> city <S%H5892><s%>, wherein are <S%H3426><s%> more <S%H7235><s%> <S%H8687><s%> than sixscore <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> thousand <S%H7239><s%> persons <S%H120><s%> that cannot discern <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8804><s%> between their right hand <S%H3225><s%> and their left hand <S%H8040><s%>; and also much <S%H7227><s%> cattle <S%H929><s%> ?
